title: Friends to Lovers - Sorcha and Aimée's First Time
description: What happens when two erotica writers who have a serious chemistry meet in person for the first time? Aimee and Sorcha, flirtatious friends who met online, take their relationship to the next level by coming together in person. Sparks fly and panties drop as the two friends share their passion for each other in this erotic adventure.
author: Aimée Maroux
